infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to scan rooms and capture photos for 3D reconstruction.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to save scanned room models.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs access to save exported STL files to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Microphone access is not used by this app.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Location access is used for magnetometer (compass) readings to guide room scanning.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app needs motion sensor access to track device orientation during room scanning.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to scan rooms.
